name: native-plugin-sync-demo
description: Apache Cordova native plugin content-sync demo

scripts.build: npm run build-plugin && npm run build-app
scripts.build-plugin: pushd echo-plugin && npm run build > /dev/null && popd
scripts.build-app: pushd demo-app && cordova prepare && cordova build --device > /dev/null && popd
scripts.package: npm run package-plugin && npm run package-app
scripts.codesign-info: npm run codesign-info-plugin && npm run codesign-info-app
scripts.codesign-info-plugin: pushd echo-plugin && npm run codesign-info && popd
scripts.codesign-verify: npm run codesign-verify-plugin && npm run codesign-verify-app
scripts.codesign-verify-plugin: pushd echo-plugin && npm run codesign-verify && popd

author: Shazron Abdullah
